description: The `Image Processing Engine` subsystem is primarily defined by the `starfish.core.image` and `starfish.core.morphology` packages, specifically focusing on `Filter`, `_registration`, `Segment`, `Binarize`, and `label_image` modules. It operates as a pipeline, where raw or pre-processed images are fed into various transformation and analysis steps. This modular and pipeline-driven structure aligns with the project's "Data Pipeline / ETL" and "Modular Design" architectural patterns, allowing for flexible construction of image analysis workflows.

components.name: Image Filtering
components.description: Responsible for applying various image enhancement and noise reduction algorithms to raw or pre-processed image data.

components.name: Image Registration
components.description: Manages the application of geometric transformations to align and register images, correcting for spatial distortions between different acquisitions or time points.

components.name: Transformation Parameters
components.description: Provides a standardized mechanism for defining, serializing, and deserializing parameters required for various image transformations.

components.name: Image Segmentation
components.description: Implements the watershed algorithm to segment images into distinct regions, typically used for separating touching objects or identifying individual structures.

components.name: Image Binarization
components.description: Performs image binarization by applying a threshold, converting grayscale images into binary (black and white) masks based on pixel intensity.

components.name: Labeled Image Representation
components.description: Encapsulates and manages image data where pixels are assigned integer labels corresponding to distinct regions or objects identified through segmentation.

components.name: Binary Mask Collection
components.description: Manages collections of binary masks, providing an organized structure for handling multiple mask datasets, often derived from binarization or segmentation.

components.name: Mask Persistence
components.description: Handles the reading and writing of binary mask data to and from persistent storage, ensuring data integrity and reusability.
